author: craigmcc
msg: HttpServletRequest.getCookies() is supposed to return null if the request
had no cookies.  We were returning a zero-length array.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add additional tests for setting request attributes in forwarded-to as well

author: craigmcc
msg: Allow an "include"d servlet to set and remove request attributes, with those
changes being made visible to the calling servlet.
Add a unit test to catch any future regressions on this issue.

author: craigmcc
msg: According to the HTTP/1.1 specification (Section 4.2), it is legal for a proxy server (and, thus, Apache's mod_proxy module) to combine header values for two occurrences of the same header like this:
Make this test succeed correctly even if this event occurs.

author: craigmcc
msg: Bring release notes up to date with respect to changes through today.
